title: WatChe
author: WatChe
created_time: June 11, 2022, 05:44:39 AMLast edit: August 12, 2022, 03:29:08 AM by WatChe
content: The XFUEL TokenThe BUSDX native token has a high 18% buy tax and 19% sell tax. These taxes help provide liquidity and also play an integral role in providing pure passive income to holders. These high taxes work extremely well on Decentralized Exchanges, therefore we want to keep the BUSDX token 100% Decentralized.As a result, BUSDX has created a low tax XFUEL token specifically designed as a trader token for Centralized Exchanges. The XFUEL token is also created on the BNB Chain.The revenue that is collected through the Centralized Exchanges will be used to FUEL the BUSDX Ecosystem. BUSDX will use these funds to buy the native BUSDX token to maintain the staking pool supply. This will result in an increase in the price of BUSDX, while also providing extra passive income to holders in BUSD.The XFUEL revenue will also be used to BURN a portion of the existing BUSDX supply. This deflationary process will make the BUSDX token more scarce over time. The XFUEL token will also be used as an alternative payment method for Xpay. [/center]Website                         Whitepaper                        XPAY | XPAD | XNFT | XSWAPFollow us on:    Disclaimer: I was just hired to create this thread. WatChe account  is not associated in any way with this project.

comments.author: langoot
comments.body: I would say its a brave move by all who are launching projects at a time when market is bearish and too much saturated with projects. Now it will require real effort that's backed by a competent team to make a project successful. Don't think it's too easy to get success in current market.

comments.author: YinShuiSiYuan
comments.body: 18 and 19 percent tax on buying and selling is quite high though it will be provide liquidity bug keep it low in the start so that more and more people jump into the project. If you start with such high rates then not many will jump in the project. Think wisely.

comments.author: janak3
comments.body: I try to figure out who is beyond the project but no such info available on your site. Try to upload info related to company or people who are beyond this project. From that we can get to know whether to invest here or not.

comments.author: srhash
comments.body: 18k$ raised in IDO and still 11 more days to go, you are going good of stats are correct. Seems like you will get desired funds easily. Let's see how much total you will get in this IDO.

comments.author: Naficopa
comments.body: Is there any exchange where this coin will be listed or you have your own exchange where it will be listed only. The real coin these days is the one that gets success in listing on major exchange like binance. Rest all are just shit coins and are not worthy for investment.

comments.author: ChpCms
comments.body: Quote from: Naficopa on June 11, 2022, 03:49:25 PMIs there any exchange where this coin will be listed or you have your own exchange where it will be listed only. The real coin these days is the one that gets success in listing on major exchange like binance. Rest all are just shit coins and are not worthy for investment. They are offering too many features like XPAY, XNFT, XSWAP which is like developing a single platform which is a kind of single stop solution. But the real question is how they roll out the product. If they can develop what they are claiming then it will definitely have a moon shot.

comments.author: Kellygucci
comments.body: Is there any MVP related to this project where we can see what you are trying to build. These days no one has the time to read lengthy whitepapers. If you have any MVP that will save the time to understand the project.

comments.author: CryptoCraze11
comments.body: Quote from: XinZang on June 11, 2022, 04:12:16 PMNFT are no more a buzz word its a reality now and that's why there are too many projects already launched in this niche. XFUEL must try to bring something new that can attract new investors. What they are offering at the moment is already launched. There are no doubt too many NFTs already in the market but trust me if you can develop an NFT platform that can attract people then that's the real business these days. Don't think that NFT game is close to over.

comments.author: tippytoes
comments.body: Quote from: XinZang on June 11, 2022, 04:12:16 PMQuote from: ChpCms on June 11, 2022, 04:00:05 PMQuote from: Naficopa on June 11, 2022, 03:49:25 PMIs there any exchange where this coin will be listed or you have your own exchange where it will be listed only. The real coin these days is the one that gets success in listing on major exchange like binance. Rest all are just shit coins and are not worthy for investment. They are offering too many features like XPAY, XNFT, XSWAP which is like developing a single platform which is a kind of single stop solution. But the real question is how they roll out the product. If they can develop what they are claiming then it will definitely have a moon shot. NFT are no more a buzz word its a reality now and that's why there are too many projects already launched in this niche. XFUEL must try to bring something new that can attract new investors. What they are offering at the moment is already launched. They are offering a wide variety of services but the question is, how are they going to attract customers? The competition is getting tough as there are so many networks that are offering similar services. Hence, they need to have some remarkable features that crypto users can identify them. Otherwise, they are facing hard challenges to get their clients on board and utilize their services.
